text: My thoughts on the Texas situation Hey all I live in a certain Midwestern state in the US  I saw that a bunch of people have been really critical of Texas recently  Unfortunately  it is not just the stereotypically dumb people we all laugh at  but like actual people who think that Texans are not as tough because they can t stand the cold Almost all of the infrastructure and buildings in Texas aren t built for this weather  This type of weather almost never happens in Texas  so it isn t worth the expense of insulation and other necessary materials if this cold only happens once every few hundred years I also saw some posts talking about how Texas  the state that wants to secede  is asking for federal aid over   inches of snow  They went on to call all conservatives sissies or whatever  Again  it s not their fault that they didn t plan for this extremely rare situation   Isn t this common sense To anyone from another country who will inevitably comment how your country is better  good for you  We see that a ton  and it isn t helping anyone out
summary: Some people have been critical of Texas recently because of the extreme cold. The infrastructure and buildings in Texas aren't built for this type of weather. Texas wants to secede and is asking for federal aid over a few inches of snow.
cleaned: people critical texas recently extreme cold infrastructure building texas not build type weather texas want secede ask federal aid inch snow
